config.wakes.title: Wakes config
config.wakes.yacl_missing: Yet Another Config Lib is not in your mods folder
config.wakes.yacl_missing.message: If you want to edit the configs you need YACL V3. Do you want to install it?
description.wakes.9_point_stencil: Old debug option. Can look good with 'subtle' wake style.
description.wakes.blend_mode.default: Subtle: Colors are closer to the water. Opacity can be changed. Great if you don't want too much.
description.wakes.blend_mode.screen:
Vibrant: Colors stand out more. Opacity can't be changed. Great if you really want to notice the wakes. 

*Vibrant style is automatically applied when using fabulous graphic settings.
description.wakes.initial_wave_strength: The distance the wakes will travel.
description.wakes.max_splash_plane_veloc: The velocity at which the maximum size of the splash plane is reached
description.wakes.minimum_producer_veloc: The velocity required to produce a wake. The higher the velocity needed, the harder it is to get wakes to spawn. The lower the velocity needed, the more wakes that spawn.
description.wakes.paddle_strength: The distance wakes spawned from boat paddles will travel.
description.wakes.spawning_rules: Defines the wakes and splashes spawning rules.
description.wakes.splash_strength: The distance wakes spawned from entities falling into water will travel.
description.wakes.use_water_blending: Should the wake's colors blend with the water's colors?
description.wakes.wake_opacity:
The opacity of the wakes. 

*Cannot be changed when using fabulous graphic settings.
description.wakes.wake_resolution: The pixel resolution of the wakes. Good for adjusting the wakes to better visually fit some resource packs.
description.wakes.wakes_in_running_water: Should wakes spawn in running water?
description.wakes.wave_decay: The speed a wake will despawn.
description.wakes.wave_speed: The speed which the wakes travel and despawn at.
option.wakes.use_9_point_stencil: Use 9 point stencil for laplace operator
